channel.title: Changing what the shops say when u enter them like at the top of interface!
channel.description:
fixed first problem lol but now i have another problem how do i cahnge the text at thetop of the shop like ergo eX: Magic shop or when you enter the shop ill give pic
[IMG]http://i570.photobucket.com/albums/ss147/lukenuke75/title.png[/img]

item.title: Changing what the shops say when u enter them like at the top of interface!
item.dc:creator: @n00bf0rlyf3 n00bf0rlyf3
item.description:
@n00bf0rlyf3 wrote:

go to shops.cfg
Then look for where it says God
Then change it to like @gre@OwNaGe_@yel@Shop

Read full topic
